official_title: ChronCan (Chronicling Cancer): Piloting a Novel Writing Intervention With Adolescents and Young Adults With Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Aged 15-25
* Currently receiving cancer-directed therapy
* Active patient at St. Jude Children's Research Hospital
* Parent of a ChronCan participant who has passed away
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 15 Years
Must have maximum age of 25 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Does not meet the inclusion criteria
* If the parents have not responded or not interviewed till December 31, 2025.
